Horstead Rectory 8pm {5 }Coltishall Primary School Hermitage Fayre 2.30 pm {7 All Saints,}6th Sunday after Pentecost. 8am Holy Comm. 10am Parish Comm.{St. John the Baptist,}Trinity 6. 8am Holy Comm. 10am Family Service. {Gt. Hautbois Church.}3pm Evensong. {Methodists.}11am Miss D. Hopkins. {Salvation Army.}10am Sunday School. 11am Holiness Meeting. 3pm Praise meeting at Lower Common. 6.30pm Salvation Meeting. Cubitt Cottage, Sloley, garden open, 2.30pm. Big 'C' appeal. Indoor bowls presentation. Coltishall Social Club.
